verses.verse: On that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%>' <S%H6887>enemy,<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen.<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king;<s%> for <S%H635>Esther<s%> had told what he was to <S%H5046>her.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> took <S%H5493>off<s%> his <S%H2885>ring,<s%> which he had <S%H5674>taken<s%> from <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it to <S%H4782>Mordecai.<s%> <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> over the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman.<s%>

<S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> yet <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>at<s%> his <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and <S%H2603>begged<s%> him with <S%H1058>tears<s%> to put <S%H5674>away<s%> the <S%H7451>mischief<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite,<s%> and his <S%H4284>device<s%> that he had <S%H2803>devised<s%> against the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> held <S%H3447>out<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H8275>scepter.<s%> So <S%H635>Esther<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

She <S%H559>said,<s%> "If it <S%H2896>pleases<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and if I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H6440>sight,<s%> and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> seem <S%H3787>right<s%> <S%H6440>to<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and I am <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> in his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> let it be <S%H3789>written<s%> to <S%H7725>reverse<s%> the <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H4284>devised<s%> by <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4099>Hammedatha<s%> the <S%H91>Agagite,<s%> which he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> to <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who are in all the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4082>provinces.<s%>

For <S%H349>how<s%> can I <S%H3201>endure<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> that would <S%H4672>come<s%> to my <S%H5971>people?<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> can I <S%H3201>endure<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H13>destruction<s%> of my <S%H4138>relatives?<s%>"

Then <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H4436>queen<s%> and to <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> the <S%H3064>Jew,<s%> <S%H5414>"See,<s%> I have given <S%H635>Esther<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H2001>Haman,<s%> and him they have <S%H8518>hanged<s%> on the <S%H6086>gallows,<s%> because he <S%H7971>laid<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H3064>Jews.<s%>

<S%H3789>Write<s%> also to the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> as it <S%H2896>pleases<s%> <S%H5869>you,<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H2856>seal<s%> it with the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2885>ring;<s%> for the <S%H3791>writing<s%> which is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H8034>name,<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2885>ring,<s%> may not be reversed by any <S%H7725>man.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H5608>scribes<s%> were <S%H7121>called<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H5510>Sivan,<s%> on the <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - third day of the <S%H2320>month;<s%> and it was <S%H3789>written<s%> according to all that <S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> to the <S%H3064>Jews,<s%> and to the <S%H323>satraps,<s%> and the <S%H6346>governors<s%> and <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> which are from <S%H1912>India<s%> to <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> - <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> to every <S%H4082>province<s%> according to its <S%H3791>writing,<s%> and to every <S%H5971>people<s%> in their <S%H3956>language,<s%> and to the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> in their <S%H3791>writing,<s%> and in their <S%H3956>language.<s%>

He <S%H3789>wrote<s%> in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> it with the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2885>ring,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H5612>letters<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H7323>courier<s%> on <S%H5483>horseback,<s%> <S%H7392>riding<s%> on royal <S%H7409>horses<s%> <S%H327>that<s%> were <S%H1121>bread<s%> from swift <S%H7424>steeds.<s%>

In those <S%H4428>letters,<s%> the king <S%H5414>granted<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who were in every <S%H5892>city<s%> to gather themselves <S%H6950>together,<s%> and to <S%H5975>defend<s%> their <S%H5315>life,<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy,<s%> to <S%H2026>kill,<s%> and to cause to <S%H6>perish,<s%> all the <S%H2428>power<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and <S%H4082>province<s%> that would <S%H6696>assault<s%> <S%H2945>them,<s%> their little ones and <S%H802>women,<s%> and to <S%H7998>plunder<s%> their <S%H962>possessions,<s%>

on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> in all the <S%H4082>provinces<s%> of <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H325>Ahasuerus,<s%> on the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> day of the <S%H8147>twelfth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> which is the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H143>Adar.<s%>

A <S%H6572>copy<s%> of the <S%H3791>letter,<s%> that the <S%H1881>decree<s%> should be <S%H5414>given<s%> out in every <S%H4082>province,<s%> was <S%H1540>published<s%> to all the <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> that the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> should be <S%H6264>ready<s%> for that <S%H3117>day<s%> to <S%H5358>avenge<s%> themselves on their <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

So the <S%H7323>couriers<s%> who <S%H7392>rode<s%> on <S%H327>royal<s%> <S%H7409>horses<s%> went <S%H3318>out,<s%> <S%H926>hastened<s%> and pressed <S%H1765>on<s%> by the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>commandment.<s%> The <S%H1697>decree<s%> was <S%H5414>given<s%> out in the <S%H1002>citadel<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa.<s%>

<S%H4782>Mordecai<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H4438>royal<s%> <S%H3830>clothing<s%> of <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H2353>white,<s%> and with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5850>crown<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and with a <S%H8509>robe<s%> of fine <S%H948>linen<s%> and <S%H713>purple;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H7800>Susa<s%> <S%H6670>shouted<s%> and was <S%H8056>glad.<s%>

In every <S%H4082>province,<s%> and in every <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H4725>wherever<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1697>commandment<s%> and his <S%H1697>decree<s%> <S%H5060>came,<s%> the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> had <S%H8342>gladness,<s%> <S%H8057>joy,<s%> a <S%H4960>feast,<s%> and a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> <S%H7227>Many<s%> from among the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> became <S%H3054>Jews;<s%> for the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3054>Jews<s%> was fallen on <S%H5307>them.<s%>
